Coding Practice Platforms

Practice makes perfect! Try these platforms:

  • LeetCode - Great for interview prep
  • HackerRank - Challenges and competitions
  • freeCodeCamp - Free certifications
  • CSES - Code Submission Evaluation System: A collection of algorithm programming practice problems.

Contribute to This Page

Know a great resource? Help us expand this page!

How to contribute:

  1. Fork our website repository
  2. Add your resource to the appropriate section
  3. Submit a pull request
  4. Or email suggestions to Maintainer

Contribution guidelines:

  • Resources should be free or have a free tier
  • Include a brief description
  • Verify links work
  • Explain why the resource is valuable
